description: The CAC Avon Sabre Mk.31 is a day fighter and fighter-bomber derived from the F-86F Sabre. It a development of the Mk.30 and has the original slatted wing replaced by the unslatted 6-3 wing, but retains the Avon 20 engine. The base variant described here is from before 1960, lacks IRMs, and has only two weapon stations.
